Question: This person was late in making formal policy proposals, but most of what he did call for were intended to reduce the deficit.
Hints: This person is married to Margot Birmingham; they have five children (Ross Jr., Nancy, Suzanne, Carolyn, and Katherine).
This person Systems was bought by Dell for $3.9 billion in 2009.
This person was refused seventy-seven times before he was given his first contract.
